ALUNT.PA.summary: Uniti S.A develops residential real estate properties. It provides managed residences, and serviced residences for seniors and students. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Paris, France.

KOF.PA.summary: Kaufman & Broad S.A. operates as a property developer and builder in France. It develops and builds single-family homes and apartments, as well as offices, hotels, retail spaces, business premises, and logistics warehouses. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Neuilly-sur-Seine, France.

It primarily operates in Paris, Ile de France, Nord-Pas-de-Calais, Picardie, and Champagne Ardennes. Les Maisons d'Aujourd'hui is headquartered in Paris, France.

MLNAT.PA.summary: Nature et Logis SA operates as a builder of ecological houses. The company is based in Saint-Pavace, France.
